SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
JavaFX Application class
BaseScene
A Base Scene used in the game.
BlockClickedListener
The Block Clicked listener is used to handle the event when a block in a GameBoard is clicked.
ChallengeScene
The Single Player challenge scene.
CommunicationsListener
The Communications Listener is used for listening to messages received by the communicator.
Communicator
Uses web sockets to talk to a web socket server and relays communication to attached listeners YOU DO NOT NEED TO WORRY ABOUT THIS CLASS! Leave it be :-)
Game
The Game class handles the main logic, state and properties of the TetrECS game.
GameBlock
The Visual User Interface component representing a single block in the grid.
GameBlockCoordinate
Represents a row and column representation of a block in the grid.
GameBoard
A GameBoard is a visual component to represent the visual GameBoard.
GameLoopListener
The Game Loop Listener is used to keep track of when the in-game timer reaches 0 It helps update the UI timer
GamePane
The Game Pane is a special pane which will scale anything inside it to the screen and maintain the aspect ratio.
GamePiece
Instances of GamePiece Represents the model of a specific Game Piece with it's block makeup.
GameWindow
The GameWindow is the single window for the game where everything takes place.
Grid
The Grid is a model which holds the state of a game board.
InstructionsScene
InstructionsScene class.
Launcher
This Launcher class is used to allow the game to be built into a shaded jar file which then loads JavaFX.
LeaderboardBox
LeaderboardBox class.
LineClearedListener
The Line Cleared Listener is called when a line is cleared in-game It takes a set of block coordinates to have the fade out animation played
LobbyScene
LobbyScene class.
MenuScene
The main menu of the game.
Multimedia
Multimedia class.
MultiplayerGame
MultiplayerGame class.
MultiplayerScene
MultiplayerScene class.
NextPieceListener
The Next Piece Listener is called whenever a new piece is generated This is used to update the representing piece boards
PieceBoard
PieceBoard class.
RightClickedListener
The Right-Clicked Listener is called when the right mouse button is pressed It is called to help rotate the piece
ScoreScene
ScoreScene class.
ShowScoreListener
ShowScoreListener interface.
SplashScene
SplashScene class.
